intro: Delissea ferox, commonly known as the fierce delissea, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Its leaves are usually narrow and hairy, while its flowers range from yellow to orange in color. Delissea ferox is often cultivated for its ornamental value and hardy nature.
